item.title: New version: system/openssl version 3.0.7
item.description: OpenSSL is a full-featured toolkit for general-purpose cryptography and secure communication.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/gflags version 2.2.2
item.description: The gflags package contains a C++ library that implements commandline flags processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/gnina version 1.0.2
item.description: A deep learning framework for molecular docking
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/protobuf version 21.9
item.description: Protocol Buffers (a.k.a., protobuf) are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral, extensible mechanism for serializing structured data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/py-rdkit version 2022.09.1_py39
item.description: RDKit is a collection of cheminformatics and machine-learning software written in C++ and Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cmake version 3.24.2
item.description: CMake is an extensible, open-source system that manages the build process in an operating system and in a compiler-independent manner.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/py-pytest version 7.1.3_py39
item.description: pytest is a full-featured Python testing framework
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/meep version 1.24.0
item.description: Meep is a free finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) simulation software package to model electromagnetic systems.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cuda version 11.7.1
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/gmtsar version 6.2.2
item.description: An InSAR processing system based on GMT (Generic Mapping Tools).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/gmt version 6.4.0
item.description: GMT (The Generic Mapping Tools) is an open source collection of command-line tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/geos version 3.11.0
item.description: GEOS (Geometry Engine - Open Source) is a C++ port of Java Topology Suite (JTS).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/gdal version 3.5.2
item.description: GDAL is a translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/proj version 9.1.0
item.description: PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software that transforms geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to another.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/py-cartopy version 0.21.0_py39
item.description: Cartopy is a Python package designed for geospatial data processing in order to produce maps and other geospatial data analyses.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/py-pyproj version 3.4.0_py39
item.description: Python interface to PROJ4 library for cartographic transformations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-globus-cli version 3.8.0_py39
item.description: A command line wrapper over the Globus SDK for Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/py-httpie version 3.2.1_py39
item.description: HTTPie is a command-line HTTP client designed for testing, debugging, and generally interacting with APIs & HTTP servers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libglvnd version 1.2.0
item.description: libglvnd is a vendor-neutral dispatch layer for arbitrating OpenGL API calls between multiple vendors.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/rust version 1.63.0
item.description: A language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/shapeit version 4.2.2
item.description: SHAPEIT4 is a fast and accurate method for estimation of haplotypes (aka phasing) for SNP array and high coverage sequencing data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/mariadb version 10.6.9
item.description: MariaDB is a community-developed fork of the MySQL relational database management system intended to remain free under the GNU GPL.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/nvtop version 2.0.3
item.description: Nvtop stands for NVidia TOP, a (h)top like task monitor for NVIDIA GPUs.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/samtools version 1.16.1
item.description: Tools (written in C using htslib) for manipulating next-generation sequencing data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/bcftools version 1.16
item.description: BCFtools is a program for variant calling and manipulating files in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/htslib version 1.16
item.description: C library for high-throughput sequencing data formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/popscle version 0.1
item.description: popscle is a suite of population scale analysis tools for single-cell genomics data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/google-cloud-sdk version 400.0.0
item.description: Command-line interface for Google Cloud Platform products and services.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/jags version 4.3.1
item.description: Just another Gibbs sampler (JAGS) is a program for simulation from Bayesian hierarchical models using Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/geos version 3.11.0
item.description: GEOS (Geometry Engine - Open Source) is a C++ port of Java Topology Suite (JTS).
item.author: mthartma@stanford.edu (Mike Hartman)

item.title: New version: system/postgresql version 14.5
item.description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system with a strong focus on reliability, feature robustness, and performance.
item.author: mthartma@stanford.edu (Mike Hartman)

item.title: New version: system/rclone version 1.59.1
item.description: Rclone is a command line program to sync files and directories to and from
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/ants version 2.4.0
item.description: ANTs computes high-dimensional mappings to capture the statistics of brain structure and function.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/yaml-cpp version 0.7.0
item.description: yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ matching the YAML 1.2 spec.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/freesurfer version 7.3.2
item.description: An open source software suite for processing and analyzing (human) brain MRI images.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/ruby version 3.1.2
item.description: A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-autograd version 1.0_py39
item.description: Autograd can automatically differentiate native Python and Numpy code.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-mpi4py version 3.1.3_py39
item.description: MPI for Python provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/2/3 specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++ bindings.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
